lead_paragraph: SIEGEL--Jerome. We are saddened beyond words by the passing of our dear friend Jerry. We considered our friendship one of life's greatest gifts, and will miss so much laughter, from New York to the Dominican Republic, from joyous travel together to quiet evenings of bridge. We are comforted with the thought that Jerry is once again with his and our dear Ruth. Our children join us in mourning his loss and honoring his life. Bobbe Munves and Al Feinman 1/3
